name: SLING (an actual blob)
description:
SLING is a prototype for a casual mobile game. Sling a ball up with ropes and try to go as high as possible through obstacles made of procedural noise. If the ball falls, the game ends.

This project was going to be a full-fledged commercial mobile game, but the mechanic didn't work as well as I'd hoped so it just ended up being a fun thing to work on in my spare time, and a good learning opportunity.

If you're interested, the source code is available on Github (though not open-source).
